import { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Container, Form, Nav, Navbar } from 'react-bootstrap' function CustomNavbar() { const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState('') const API_KEY = 'c0244df251672a4e585ee6e01739992d' const fetchLocation = () => { fetch( `http://api.openweathermap.org/geo/1.0/direct?q={city name},{state code},{country code}&limit=5&appid=${API_KEY}` ) } return (
setSearchValue(e.target.value)} />
Home News Live
) } export default CustomNavbar
